join.title: Join
join.desc: Task management tool inspired by the Kanban system. Create, organize and manage tasks using drag-and-drop. Assign them to users and sync everything in real time via Firebase. Perfect for collaborative teams.

el-pollo-loco.title: El Pollo Loco
el-pollo-loco.desc: A fun arcade game built with JavaScript. Control a cartoon chicken, dodge enemies, and collect points. Includes animations, mobile support and no external libraries.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.desc: A responsive app using the PokéAPI. Search, filter, and explore detailed data about Pokémon including stats, types, and abilities.

client1.title: T. Schulz
client1.text: Working with Rahmi was a real stroke of luck for me. He not only brings technical expertise but also a high level of empathy, structure, and professionalism. No matter how complex the project was, Rahmi always kept an overview and delivered reliable results.

client2.title: E. Fatih
client2.text: If anyone embodies the word 'reliability', it's Rahmi. He's analytical, solution-oriented, and always open to new ideas. His sense of aesthetics and usability sets him apart from many other developers. It was a pleasure working with him.

client3.title: J. Roth
client3.text: Rahmi impresses not only with his professional skills but also with his exceptional dedication. He's always one step ahead, contributes creative solutions, and remains focused and team-oriented. Working with him was truly enriching for me.

contact.title: Let's Connect!

section1.title: 1. Overview of Data Protection
section1.text1: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data by which you can be personally identified. Detailed information can be found in the full privacy policy below.

sub1.title: Data Collection on This Website
sub1.text1: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. Contact details can be found below under 'Responsible Party'. Some data is collected when you provide it to us – for example via the contact form.
sub1.text2: Other data is collected automatically when you visit the website (e.g. browser type, time of access). This data is collected automatically to ensure the secure and error-free operation of the website. No further evaluation takes place.

sub2.title: Your Rights
sub2.text1: You have the right to receive information free of charge at any time about the origin, recipients, and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have the right to request correction or deletion of this data and to revoke any given consent at any time. You can also lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.

section2.title: 2. Hosting
section2.text2: We have entered into a data processing agreement (DPA) with the provider. The processing is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in secure operation).

section3.title: 3. Responsible Party
section3.text1: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
section3.name: Rahmi Esen

section4.title: 4. Contact Form
section4.text1: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your information will be stored for the purpose of processing the request. This data will not be shared without your consent.
section4.text2: The processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (pre-contractual measures) or on your legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

section5.title: 5. No Cookies or Analytics
section5.text1: This website does not use cookies, tracking, or analytics tools.
